sn22.153:4.2: “Kismiṃ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṃ upādāya, kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:4.3: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn22.153:4.5: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṃ upādāya, rūpaṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:4.6: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.153:4.10: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṃ upādāya, viññāṇaṃ abhinivissa, evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn22.153:4.11: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’ti.
sn22.153:4.12: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha, bhikkhave, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.153:4.14: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.153:4.16: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:4.17: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
sn22.153:4.24: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn22.153:4.26: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, api nu taṃ anupādāya evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn22.153:4.27: ‘no cassaṃ, no ca me siyā, nābhavissa, na me bhavissatī’”ti?
